tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credit_education_program (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE credit_education_program (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  education_start_date DATE,
  education_end_date DATE,
  credit_score_before INT,
  credit_score_after INT
);

CREATE TABLE participation_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  participation_date TIMESTAMP,
  participation_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Credit_Programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  program_id INT REFERENCES Credit_Programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE credit_application (
  application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(50),
  credit_score INT,
  program_participation BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE program_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  program_name VARCHAR(50),
  participation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE program_details (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  credit_points INT
)

CREATE TABLE credit_score_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  credit_score INT,
  update_date DATE,
  reason VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE program_instructors (
  instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instructor_name VARCHAR(50),
  program_id INT,
  experience_years INT
)
